number of training and test instances.from sentence: shows the number of training and test instances in each category .

Word embeddings.from sentence: Word embeddings in AEN - Glo Ve do not get updated in the learning process , but we fine - tune pre-trained BERT 3 in AEN - BERT .

Embedding dimension d dim.from sentence: Embedding dimension d dim is 300 for GloVe and is 768 for pretrained BERT .

Dimension.from sentence: Dimension of hidden states d hid is set to 300 .

weights.from sentence: The weights of our model are initialized with Glorot initialization .

Adam optimizer ( Kingma and Ba , 2014 ).from sentence: Adam optimizer ( Kingma and Ba , 2014 ) is applied to update all the parameters .

During.from sentence: During training , we set label smoothing parameter to 0.2 , the coefficient ? of L 2 regularization item is 10 ? 5 and dropout rate is 0.1 .
